title: Shipping & Return Policy
description: Shipping and return policy for Melmua's services
intro: Melmua Inc. ("we," "our," or "us") is committed to providing transparent shipping and return policies. This policy outlines our shipping methods, delivery times, and return procedures.

sections.title: Shipping Information
sections.description: We offer reliable shipping services to ensure your orders arrive safely and on time.

items.title: Processing Time
items.description: We ship within 2–3 business days after your order is confirmed.

items.title: Delivery Times
items.description: Delivery times range from 5–10 business days depending on your location.

items.title: Order Processing
items.description: Orders are processed Monday–Friday, excluding holidays.

items.title: Shipping Charges
items.description: Shipping charges are calculated at checkout based on your location and order size.

items.title: Shipping Regions
items.description: Currently shipping within United States and Canada.

sections.title: Return Policy
sections.description: We strive to ensure your complete satisfaction with every purchase.

items.title: Return Window
items.description: Returns accepted within 14 days of delivery on unopened, unused products only.

items.title: Return Process
items.description: To initiate a return, contact our support team with your order number and issue.

items.title: Refund Processing
items.description: Refunds will be processed to your original payment method within 5–7 days after receiving the returned item.

sections.title: International Shipping
sections.description: Information about our international shipping policies and procedures.
sections.content: Currently, we only ship to the United States and Canada. We are working on expanding our shipping capabilities to other regions. Please check back for updates on international shipping availability.

highlight.title: Customs and Duties
highlight.description: For international orders, customers are responsible for any customs duties, taxes, or fees that may be charged by their country's customs authority.

sections.title: Order Tracking
sections.description: How to track your order and what to do if there are issues.
sections.content: Once your order ships, you will receive a tracking number via email. You can use this number to track your package's location and estimated delivery date through our website or the carrier's tracking system.

items.title: Delivery Issues
items.description: If you experience any issues with delivery, please contact our support team immediately.

sections.title: Need Help?
sections.description: We're here to help with any shipping or return questions.
sections.content: If you have questions about your order, shipping, or returns, our support team is ready to assist you.

footer: By placing an order with Melmua, you agree to our shipping and return policies. Thank you for choosing Melmua Inc.
